elements.content: IRXRD diffractogramcrystallographic data‡ Slow inter-diffusion of two acetonitrile solutions (10 mL), one of (Bu3NH)3[W(CN)8]·4H2O (52.4 mg, 0.05 mmol) and the other containing [Cu(valen)] (19.8 mg, 0.05 mmol) and Tb(NO3)3·5H2O (0.05 mmol; 11 mg) afforded, in the same test tube, two types of X-ray quality crystals, light green plate-like of 1 and brownish-green prisms of 2.
elements.clean_text:
IR

XRD diffractogram

crystallographic data

‡ Slow inter-diffusion of two acetonitrile solutions (10 mL), one of (Bu3NH)3[W(CN)8]⋅4H2O (52.4 mg, 0.05 mmol) and the other containing [Cu(valen)] (19.8 mg, 0.05 mmol) and Tb(NO3)3⋅5H2O (0.05 mmol; 11 mg) afforded, in the same test tube, two types of X-ray quality crystals, light green plate-like of 1 and brownish-green prisms of 2.

elements.content: § Crystal data: X-ray data were collected by using an STOE IPDS II diffractometer using graphite monochromated MoKα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å). Crystal data for 1: empirical formula C26H32N10O11CuTbW, M = 1066.93, monoclinic, space group P21/n, a = 9.9903(2), b = 26.4341(7), c = 13.3220(3) Å, β = 101.056(2)°, V = 3452.84(14) Å3, Z = 4, T = 293(2) K, ρcalcd = 2.025 g cm−3, F(000) = 2000, μ(Mo-Kα) = 6.029 mm−1, R1 = 0.0481 for 10366 [I > 2σ(I)] and 0.1178 for all 13337 data. Crystal data for 2: empirical formula C26H33N10O11CuTbW, M = 1089.96, monoclinic, space group P21, a = 9.0828(3), b = 20.1071(6), c = 10.2803(3) Å, β = 95.118(2)°, V = 1869.99(10) Å3, Z = 2, T = 293(2) K, ρcalcd = 1.914 g cm−3, F(000) = 2028, μ(Mo-Kα) = 5.567 mm−1, R1 = 0.0361 for 12228 [I > 2σ(I)] and 0.0609 for all 14415 data. The structures were solved (SHELXS-97) by direct methods and refined (SHELXL-97) by full-matrix least-square procedures on F2. All non-H atoms were refined anisotropically. CCDC reference numbers: 888085 (1) and 888086 (2).
elements.clean_text: § Crystal data: X-ray data were collected by using an STOE IPDS II diffractometer using graphite monochromated MoKα radiation (λ = 0.71073 Å). Crystal data for 2: empirical formula C26H33N10O11CuTbW, M = 1089.96, monoclinic, space group P21, a = 9.0828(3), b = 20.1071(6), c = 10.2803(3) Å, β = 95.118(2)°, V = 1869.99(10) Å3, Z = 2, T = 293(2) K, ρcalcd = 1.914 g cm-3, F(000) = 2028, μ(Mo-Kα) = 5.567 mm-1, R1 = 0.0361 for 12228 [I > 2σ(I)] and 0.0609 for all 14415 data. The structures were solved (SHELXS-97) by direct methods and refined (SHELXL-97) by full-matrix least-square procedures on F2. All non-H atoms were refined anisotropically. CCDC reference numbers: 888085 (1) and 888086 (2).

Crystal data for 1: empirical formula C26H32N10O11CuTbW, M = 1066.93, monoclinic, space group P21/n, a = 9.9903(2), b = 26.4341(7), c = 13.3220(3) Å, β = 101.056(2)°, V = 3452.84(14) Å3, Z = 4, T = 293(2) K, ρcalcd = 2.025 g cm-3, F(000) = 2000, μ(Mo-Kα) = 6.029 mm-1, R1 = 0.0481 for 10366 [I > 2σ(I)] and 0.1178 for all 13337 data. Crystal data for 2: empirical formula C26H33N10O11CuTbW, M = 1089.96, monoclinic, space group P21, a = 9.0828(3), b = 20.1071(6), c = 10.2803(3) Å, β = 95.118(2)°, V = 1869.99(10) Å3, Z = 2, T = 293(2) K, ρcalcd = 1.914 g cm-3, F(000) = 2028, μ(Mo-Kα) = 5.567 mm-1, R1 = 0.0361 for 12228 [I > 2σ(I)] and 0.0609 for all 14415 data. The structures were solved (SHELXS-97) by direct methods and refined (SHELXL-97) by full-matrix least-square procedures on F2. All non-H atoms were refined anisotropically. CCDC reference numbers: 888085 (1) and 888086 (2).
